name: NSTextSelectionNavigation.Direction
desc: Values that describe the direction of a selection.

items.name: case forward
items.desc: The value that represents a logical forward selection based on the flow of text stored in the document.

items.name: case backward
items.desc: The value that represents a backward selection based on the flow of text stored in the document.

items.name: case left
items.desc: The value that represents a selection in the left direction along the current line.

items.name: case right
items.desc: The value that represents a selection in the right direction along the current line.

items.name: case up
items.desc: The value that represents a selection in the up direction, above the current line.

items.name: case down
items.desc: The value that represents a selection in the down direction, below the current line.
